name: N.O.V.A. 2: The Hero Rises Again
description: Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance 2: The Hero Rises Again, also called N.O.V.A. 2: The Hero Rises Again, is a first-person shooter video game, developed and published by Gameloft. It is the second installment of the N.O.V.A. series made for the Apple Inc. iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, HP Touchpad, and Blackberry Playbook, and sequel to the original N.O.V.A. game and predecessor to N.O.V.A. 3. The game was released to the App Store on December 16, 2010 for iOS. N.O.V.A. 2 features Gameloft's multiplayer service Gameloft Live.
